messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]
messages.msgSnippet: **It s a shame that some people spend their time trying to help other families be more at peace and live in more freedom, and then once in a while someone
messages.messageBody:
**It's a shame that some people spend their time trying to help other
families
be more at peace and live in more freedom, and then once in a while someone
feels compelled to spend some of THEIR time undermining that. It's not
worth
doing, really.**

I've got a new metaphor -- brace yourself.

The internet "ice cream shop" of email groups offers 31 million flavors.
If you don't like the one you just tried, then put down the little
plastic spoon and take a taste from another one. <g>

Or one can try adding chocolate sprinkles or maraschino cherries or oat
bran or a shot of tequila as a chaser, whatever. But it's unkind to
those who do like the flavor to get all indignant and start picketing
the corporate headquarters and chanting "yuck" in attempt to get the
flavor reformulated. Some of us LOVE chunky-funky-unskunky-unschooly
ripple.

Betsy
